thread.title: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Rentrak Corporation - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Rentrak Corporation - Yahoo Finance

author: Harwood Feffer LLP
title: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Rentrak Corporation - Yahoo Finance
text:
NEW YORK, Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Harwood Feffer LLP ( www.hfesq.com ) is investigating potential claims against the board of directors of Rentrak Corporation ("Rentrak" or the "Company") ( RENT ) concerning the proposed acquisition of the Company by ComScore Inc. ("ComScore").
View photo
. Under the terms of the offer, the ComScore would acquire Rentrak in a transaction valued at approximately $800 million. Pursuant to the deal, Rentrak stockholders would receive 1.15 shares of ComScore per share Rentrak share owned, consideration worth $52.76 at present. According to Yahoo Finance, multiple analysts have set target prices for Rentrak stock above the offer price and that the mean analyst target price for Rentrak stock is $73.50. At least one analyst has set a target price of $100 for Rentrak shares. 
Our investigation concerns whether the Rentrak board of directors is fulfilling its fiduciary duties, maximizing the value of the Company, disclosing all material benefits and costs, and obtaining full and fair consideration for Company stockholders. 
If you own Rentrak shares and wish to discuss this matter with us, or have any questions concerning your rights and interests with regard to this matter, please contact:
Benjamin I Sachs-Michaels, Esq.
Robert I. Harwood, Esq.

Attorney Advertising. The law firm responsible for this advertisement is Harwood Feffer LLP ( www.hfesq.com ). Prior results do not guarantee or predict a similar outcome with respect to any future matter.
